name: SamsungWirelessAudio
0:
”Alexa, turn on the living room.”
”Alexa, turn up the volume in the living room.”
”Alexa, play music in the living room.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this skill you can control your Samsung Sound+ soundbar via Amazon Alexa enabled devices.

Things to do before you enable this skill.
1) Download the SmartThings App from the Google Play Store or the Apple App store.
2) Create a Samsung Account if you do not have one.
3) Register your device to your Samsung Account.
4) Change your Samsung Sound+ series to a name supported by Alexa such as living room, kitchen, bedroom, etc.

To get started.
1) Enable the Samsung Wireless Audio skill
2) Link your Samsung Account and complete setup
3) Then ask "Alexa, play some music in the <device name>"
 
Supported Soundbar Models : HW-MS750, HW-MS650, HW-MS6500, HW-MS550, HW-NW700, HW-N950, HW-N850, HW-Q90R, HW-Q80R, HW-Q70R

Supported Music Service Providers : Amazon Music, iHeartRadio and TuneIn
